name: skytrade-poc
description: SkyTrade Proof of Concept for air rights marketplace and drone flight management

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend-new && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build && cd frontend-new && npm run build
scripts.setup:env: cd frontend-new && cp .env.example .env && echo 'Created .env file. Please edit it to add your Mapbox token.'
